short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to set a custom shortcut button next to your address bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Custom Shortcut Button puts a new button next to your address bar, which you can then use to easily and repeatedly open a custom URL in a new tab. To set the URL please right click on the icon and select "Options".

Changelog:

V1.0 - Jan 31st 2017
- Initial release.

For any issues please contact button@xylophono.com :)
